schema.sql: CREATE TABLE PRICELIST (PriceId INT(5) AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, Price float(4,2));
CREATE TABLE GENDER (GenderId INT(5) AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, Description VARCHAR(15));
CREATE TABLE CONSOLES (ConsoleId INT(5) AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, Name VARCHAR(20));
CREATE TABLE PRODUCTS (ProductId INT(5) AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, Name VARCHAR(35), StockQuantity INT(5), PriceId INT(5), FOREIGN KEY (PriceId) REFERENCES PRICELIST(PriceId));
CREATE TABLE MEMBERS (DNI CHAR (10) PRIMARY KEY, Name VARCHAR(20), Mail VARCHAR(30), PhoneNumber CHAR (9));

CREATE TABLE VIDEOGAMES (GameId INT(5) AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, Title VARCHAR(30), GenderId INT(5), ConsoleId INT(5), StockQuantity INT(5), PriceId INT(5), FOREIGN KEY (GenderId) REFERENCES GENDER(GenderId), FOREIGN KEY (ConsoleId) REFERENCES CONSOLES(ConsoleId), FOREIGN KEY (PriceId) REFERENCES PRICELIST(PriceId));
